description: Modifies an existing event notification subscription. Note that you can't modify the source identifiers using this call; to change source identifiers for a subscription, use the  AddSourceIdentifierToSubscription and  RemoveSourceIdentifierFromSubscription calls. You can see a list of the event categories for a given SourceType by using the DescribeEventCategories action.

parameters.name: SubscriptionName
parameters.description: The name of the event notification subscription.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description: The type of source that is generating the events. For example, if you want to be notified of events generated by a DB instance, you would set this parameter to db-instance. if this value is not specified, all events are returned. Valid values: db-instance | db-parameter-group | db-security-group | db-snapshot.

parameters.name: EventCategories
parameters.description: A list of event categories for a SourceType that you want to subscribe to. You can see a list of the categories for a given SourceType by using the DescribeEventCategories action. (string) ---

nested_items.name: EventSubscription
nested_items.description: Contains the results of a successful invocation of the  DescribeEventSubscriptions action.

nested_items.name: CustomerAwsId
nested_items.description: The Amazon customer account associated with the event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicArn
nested_items.description: The topic ARN of the event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionCreationTime
nested_items.description: The time the event notification subscription was created.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The source type for the event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: SourceIdsList
nested_items.description: A list of source IDs for the event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: EventCategoriesList
nested_items.description: A list of event categories for the event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating if the subscription is enabled. True indicates the subscription is enabled.

nested_items.name: EventSubscriptionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the event subscription.
